name: THIRD TRANSMISSION (autographed edition)
description: When a scientist makes an amazing discovery – a machine with the power to transmit matter instantly from one place to another – Agent Six has to stop her from unearthing an ancient evil. But this new technology is even more dangerous than he realises... watch the trailer "From the very first paragraph – opening with a strong female character to put Meyer’s ‘Bella’ to shame – the reader is introduced to an action-packed, fantastical high-octane tale to keep the pages turning." —Tara Moss, award-winning author of the Pandora English series Your book will arrive between 4 and 15 business days after payment is received. Get $5 back after you buy! Just review this book on any website and email us the link less than 60 days after your purchase.

name: MONEY RUN (autographed edition)
description: Ash is a teenage thief – the best there is. She's discovered $200 million hidden in the office building of a local billionaire. Her plan is simple. Get in, get rich, and get out. But she doesn't know that the billionaire has enemies. Like the assassin who breaks into the building on the same day she does, and who needs Ash out of his way. Pretty soon, Ashley isn't worried about getting out with the $200 million. She’d be happy just to get out alive. Shortlisted for the Nottinghamshire Brilliant Book Award and packed with explosive action, MONEY RUN is the perfect book to get a smart teen hooked on reading. Watch a fan-made trailer "Humour, suspense, intrigue, action and that character-driven stuff your English teacher is always going on about. It’s part-24, part-Alias, all-kickass, and a highly recommended read." —William Kostakis, author of Loathing Lola Your book will arrive between 4 and 15 business days after payment is received. Get $5 back after you buy! Just review this book on any website and email us the link less than 60 days after your purchase.

name: MANUSCRIPT ASSESSMENT
description:
Hire award-winning author Jack Heath to study your writing and provide detailed feedback! Submit up to 5000 words of your work (in any file format), and Jack will offer practical advice about the characters, plot, setting, writing style, publication and more.

After you make your payment, Jack will contact you within 12 hours. Once your writing has been submitted, you will receive a thorough review within three weeks.
